sourceText: The Inner Life; Man Visible and Invisible; The Chakras
note: Theosophical variant of Chaldean order — swaps Mercury and Venus from standard Chaldean

Saturn.initiation: First — mystery of physical material, instincts, impurity

Jupiter.initiation: Second — purification of emotion, love without attachment, and service
Jupiter.sense: Astral clairvoyance — emotion sensing, aura, dreamlike perceptions
Jupiter.devicStage: Astral Devas — emotional, unstable, reactive, tied to human thought and emotion

Mars.plane: Mental/Lower Causal — thought, reason, imagination, and ideas
Mars.initiation: Third — mastery of mind, soul consciousness, alignment with abstract thinking
Mars.sense: Telepathy — thought-form, symbol and perception, symbolic thought
Mars.devicStage: Building Devas — builders of forms on mental planes, work with karma and thought-forms in elemental substance

Sun.plane: Buddhic/Intuitional — love, wisdom, unity consciousness, direct knowing
Sun.initiation: Fourth — ego death, heart awakening, unity consciousness, and sacrifice
Sun.devicStage: Angelic Devas — Devas of harmony and wisdom, agents of love, intuition, unity, group karma, compassion, and spiritual ecology

Mercury.initiation: Fifth — the true adept, divine will embodied, conscious co-creator with evolution
Mercury.sense: Spiritual vision — seeing through directly, surrender to law, sensing purpose, seeing spiritual will
Mercury.devicStage: Planetary Devas — Lords of karma, embodiment of divine will and law, patterns and design of evolution

Venus.plane: Monadic — archetypal causes and pure will
Venus.initiation: Sixth — liberation from individual karma, planetary service, beyond scale, beyond identity
Venus.devicStage: Cosmic/Solar Devas — serve as vehicles of planetary purpose, above duality, cycles of great choice

Moon.initiation: Seventh — union with the divine source, cosmic consciousness, Nirvana
